Now tell me, do I know what you want?" Leon nodded, remembering that Darkness had a habit of observing riders and figuring them out. "I thought so, now listen carefully... most dragons have 2 stomachs, one for fuel, and one for food OR storage, now I suppose you know which one you want, but the trick is to make Shade's digestive juices not come in. It will either take weeks to train so he can do it at will, risk it every time, or drink a potion so they don't activate for a day. Now, which one? Unless I already knew"

12.content:
"Somehow I don't think that it was worth finding and recruiting a dragon for this" Alia mumbled as she read over her orders again. "Fighting off orcs? That's work for normal knights."

Alia was a rather average human female of twenty with red hair and green eyes. She wore a set of green armor over a simple cloth skirt. "Oh well, I guess it can't be to choosy about what I do," she looked over to the large bronze dragon snoozing beside her. "Okay, Rune time to get to work."

"And," she asked, stretching like a cat. "What would that be this time?"

"It says here that a few goblin tribes have allied together and are conducting raids on the human settlements to the east. We've been hired to get rid of them." Alia recited the orders as she climbed onto the special harness on the dragon's back. "Well, let's go."

Rune flaps her wings as she flies over the marching goblin horde. From what Alia could see, the goblins don't have any sort of ranged weapons to use for defense against her dragon. In fact, the only weapons they seem to be carrying are wooden clubs and their armor consists of only loincloths. The problem however, is that there are 200 of them!

"I'm not sure I can eat THAT many goblins!" Rune gasps.

Rune's greedy personality explains why the bronze dragon is the fattest dragon in the dragon stables. But there’s muscle underneath all that blubber. If there wasn’t, then Alia and her dragon would have become some monster’s diner a long time ago. And despite Rune's flaws, Alia can't help but love her big fat dragon.

Alia smacks her forehead with her hand, "Rune, you don't have to eat every monster we fight! All you have to do is kill them!"

"What?!" Rune exclaims indignantly, "There are starving dragons in third world countries, so I refuse to waste food like that! I'll just have to do my best and hope I can manage to scarf them all down."

12123.content:
The Chief of the Goblins held a sword to Alia's throat and shouted to Rune, "Bronze Dragon, do as I say or I will kill your rider."

Seeing that she could do nothing without risking Alia's death, the dragon humbly bowed her head in submission.

Sneering because of his power over a great dragon, the Goblin chief ordered, "First you fat pig of a dragon, vomit up my warriors, for some may still be alive."

Rune replied, "Your wish is my command, Oh Chief, but to do so you'll have to undo the chains, for I must raise my body up to heave. You don't have to worry for you have my rider. And be quick about it for they will not last long with the acid and lack of air."

The Goblin Chief weighed his options. The monster had swallowed his brother and oldest son. Could he just kill the dragon, he wondered. No the monster allowed itself to be bound because the woman was held hostage. But it would not submit to death, and their weapons could not penetrate its thick hide. Plus, with the woman as a hostage and the great dragon undrer his control, he would become the greatest Goblin Chief in the land.

"Very well", he said , "unchain the dragon".

Rune raisied her back legs high and dipped the front of her body low and began to hack. In a few moments a great lumpy mass could be seen quickly moving up here throat, and a moment later, with a great retching sound she vomited the mass of writhing, choking goblins, as well as gallons of stinking, acid vomit all over Alia and the Goblin Chief, knocking them both down.

Her head immediately darted forward to snap up the Chief, shaking the sword out of his hand before bolting him down. And before any of the goblins could react, she snatched up Alia, and with her stomach nearly empty, leaped into the air, and to safety.

Rune dropped Alia on a rock ledge way from the Goblins, and went back to wreak her revenge. With their leader devoured, the Goblins were demoralized, and seeing the dragon return, caused them to break formation and flee into the woods.

This was their death sentence, for divided they were nothing but morsels of dragon food, and Rune began the chase gobbling them up as they ran, and when the remainder went into hiding, her senstive nose ferreted them out. Very few escaped, and again too heavy to fly, she slowly crawled back to the the spot of the first battle, and gulped down the struggling and dead goblins in the pool of vomit, and like a dog lapped up all of here mess.

Content and sluggish with her enormous, meal she lulled off to sleep not realizing she had left Alia on a ledge, covered in dragon vomit.

Alia paced back in forth on the small rock ledge, wondering what became of her dragon partner. She itched, and stunk horribly but there was nothing around to clean the slime off with save for chips of sharp stone. It would be dark soon, and dangerous predators would begin to lurk, and she wasn't sure if here terrible smell would attract or repel them. It looked like there was was a way she could climb to the bottom, but then what? Without her huge companion as protection, she would never make it back to a human settlement. She weighed her options:

133.content:
The huge dragon eyed the ham-sized chunk of meat with disdain. "Are you kidding me boy? That tiny mouthful is hardly worth the swallow. But I hunger for a real meal, and if you are not so squeamish, you may go hunting with me."

Secretly, Leon like nothing better in the whole world that to watch his huge companion capture and devour its prey, in the "dragon way", which usually meant swallowing smaller animals whole and alive. He was embarrassed about this fetish however, and did not want anyone else to know how much pleasure Shade's feeding brought him.

Not wanting the dragon to see how excited this prospect was to him, Leon shrugged, and said, "Sure, Shade, I'll come with you if you like".

Shade grinned. Like most dragonriders, Leon was unaware of his dragon's ability to read his rider's mind. Shade knew of Leon's secret, vorish fantasies, and he decided to use this knowledge best to his advantage. He pressed his body low to the ground to allow Leon to mount on his back, just at the base of his neck.

One he felt Leon securely wedged between two dorsal spines, Shade playfully commanded, "Hold on tight", and lept into the sky.

The two headed north towards the great valley where the Weyr's herd beasts that made up the bulk of the domestic dragon's diet dwelled, in plain view of many dragons and riders commencing the morning routine. Curiously though, once out of sight, Shade dipped low beneath the tree line, and circled back, unseen, south. In a short tie they came to a stone inn, that was known to dragonriders for its stable of whores.

Shade carefully landed on a huge stone boulder next to the inn, careful to leave now tracks, and promptly stuck his head in one of the inns upper bedroom windows.

Shocked, Leon implored, "Stop, Shade what are you doing? A shrill scream was heard, as the huge silver dragon pulled his head back out with a pair of wildly writhing female legs in its mouth. His head made a quick jerk forward, and the struggling woman disappeared down Shades rippling, muscular gullet, her screams faintly discernable through the thick dragonhide.

The dragon slyly craned his head back to face Leon at uncomfortably close range, and said in a completely nonchanlant tone, "What am I doing? Silly boy, I am eating the only prey fit for a noble Silver dragon, besides overly nosy and immature dragon riders, that is. And I know you won't tell, for if I am banished to the wilderness for breaking the dragon-human covenant, YOU will no longer be a dragonrider.

Then Shade gave a toothy dragon grin, and shot his long forked tongue into Leon's crouch, were it touched a hard knot of muscle. The dragon whispered, "Do what I say and we'll never get caught. Besides, I know you love this, Leon. Now, how would you like to make love to the next whore inside my mouth, before I swallow her? Hmmmmmmmmmmmmm?"
133.title: Shade takes Leon on his morning hunt.
